message.body: Returning to your 87% point, I've been listening to a bunch of important medieval scholars talk about things that are not only at a notable remove from reality,but alll happened at least 500 years ago...I would even go so far as to suggest that I am 97 per cent sure that there is something that I am missing.
I take that back...history and art are both preferable.

I'm not sure I remember the potency in this discussion, but before I get lost in the fray of work, next week is my spring break and I'll be in the city if you'd want to talk art and history over pizza... Or tacos or something.
